lines.text: [Sam Brooke is shot during a hold-up]
Where'd they get you, Dad?
Where they have to get most Rangers - in the back!
[The Three Mesquiteers hear gunfire]
That must be the party we were invited to!
[The ex-Rangers see a sign reading "Monroe County Police - John Brooke, Captain Commanding" over their old office]
They moved in pretty fast, didn't they?
Looks like they're giving Johnny featured billing.
[The Mesquiteers ride to Ben Walker's ranch to urge him not to pay protection money]
Looks like that three-man jury is going to give us a bad verdict.
Want me to handle the case, Judge?
Yes - it does need special handling. In this case, we'll overrule the usual procedure. Ben Walker is going to be raided before he refuses.
I ain't particular - before or after!
[The Mesquiteers, not knowing Walker has been bushwhacked, wait in jail for him to clear them of robbery charges]
Has Walker shown up yet?
Nope. I told you I'd let you know the minute he does.
He sure picked a good time to play hide-and-go-seek.
[Deputy Sheriff Cantrell accuses the Mesquiteers of murdering Walker to cover-up the stagecoach robbery]
That figuring just about leaves us out on a limb.
Yeah - and dangling from ropes!
[with the help of the jailer's pet crow, the Three Mesquiteers escape]
Where'd they go?
They went that-a-way, Sheriff!
[examining chewed wood found where the murderer waited for Walker]
Fellows, I got it - all we got to do is find the termite who whittles his own toothpicks.
[Lullaby stuffs medicine bottles down his shirt]
What are you doing?
Doc forgot to pay me for my singing, so I'm taking it out in trade.
Take one for our *friend*. If he doesn't talk he'll need some pain killer.
